title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\NetworkRoutingConfig
name: NetworkRoutingConfig
description:
A routing configuration attached to a network resource. The message includes the list of routers associated with the network, and a flag indicating the type of routing behavior to enforce network-wide.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.NetworkRoutingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.routing_mode
params.description: The network-wide routing mode to use. If set to REGIONAL, this network's Cloud Routers will only advertise routes with subnets of this network in the same region as the router. If set to GLOBAL, this network's Cloud Routers will advertise routes with all subnets of this network, across regions. Check the RoutingMode enum for the list of possible values.

methods.name: getRoutingMode
methods.description:
The network-wide routing mode to use. If set to REGIONAL, this network's Cloud Routers will only advertise routes with subnets of this network in the same region as the router. If set to GLOBAL, this network's Cloud Routers will advertise routes with all subnets of this network, across regions.

Check the RoutingMode enum for the list of possible values.
